title: Stage Lv3-P3-S13
description: Level 3 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I remember the place where we met. (variant 1)
That's the reason why I was late. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 3 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I remember the place where we met. (variant 1)
That's the reason why I was late. (variant 1)
Do you know when he left? (variant 1)
This is how I do it. (variant 1)
I miss the city where we lived. (variant 1)
What's the reason why they succeeded? (variant 1)
This is the hospital where I was born. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 우리가 처음 만난 순간을 잊을 수 없어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I can't forget the moment when we first met. (variant 1)
That's how we solve the problem. (variant 1)
That's the school where I studied. (variant 1)
I remember the place where we met. (variant 2)

This is the hospital where I was born. (variant 2)
